description:
This course shares my story of getting my book published, which quickly turned into a number one bestseller. I share my best practise insights into the secrets of the publishing world. I've turned my experiences into a step-by-step approach, which will help you to turn your written manuscript into a physical book. By when would you like to hold your own book in your hands?

In addition to publishing, we'll discuss many fundamental topics, such as how to select a title that works and how to design a book cover that will make people want to pick up your book. We'll also talk about ISBN numbers, copyrights and plagiarism issues and much more.

Get all my publishing secrets and discover why some authors are sought after and publish their books around the world! This course is one of the most crucial resources in the world when it comes to quickly and easily getting your book published!
title: Publish your Book the Easy Way
